about_the_game:
NOT RECOMMENDED FOR THOSE WITH MOTION SICKNESS

You have started your new job at a company called "Ergo". This company consists of secret agents, however before they can send you out for your first mission, you need to go through training...

simulated through Virtual Reality, Ergo is a VR Puzzle game designed with the main focus of cube and button based testing, with each test varying in difficulty and uniqueness.

This will be your training ground, getting you equipped with environments involving cube and button based testing with many obstacles and new mechanics being introduced along the way, including the merge between a old virtual office repurposed into a testing enviroment

This demo includes two levels from the Early Access version of Ergo

Making a video for Ergo? Use Smooth Camera! Smoothens the footage for your video along with that use #ErgoVR for more traction!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a VR Headset with motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a VR Headset with motion controllers

short_description: Ergo is a virtual reality puzzle game with several office based enviroments with varying amounts of difficulty.
